TopicTitle: The warmest, most sensible pair of speeches I have ever heard.

Articles.Content:
[video=youtube;wMKpYxhI2KI]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wMKpYxhI2KI[/video]

[video=youtube;EWPFmdAWRZ0]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EWPFmdAWRZ0[/video]



These videos really open my eyes on what Humanity is and what it needs to be.

Honestly, i expect Humanity to get kinder and wiser the more technology rolled along, but now we're on the brink of complete self-annihilation.

I don't want to live in that kind of world. Edited November 26, 2015 by Souper
